entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:57 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 10:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -8.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: E 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Overcast. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Overcast. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
